```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
imdb <- read_csv("/Users/danielyang/Downloads/BIS15W2025_group10-main/data/tv_only.csv")
```

```{r}
imdb %>% 
  select(rating, start_year) %>% 
  group_by(start_year) %>% 
  summarize(mean = mean(rating, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  arrange(start_year) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = start_year, y = mean, fill = mean, color = mean))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()
```
